decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plan SC/00/14/1A submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The extension hereby permitted shall not be occupied or used at any time other than as part of the dwelling known as 148 Bedfont Close.
description: Demolition of garage and erection of a single storey rear extension to dwellinghouse
